meta.title: From KAL to EL
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: It's Superman week! Superman was born Kal-El on the planet Krypto. His parents were Jor-El and Lara. "Kal-El" apparently translates to "Star Child" in Kryptonian. Which, assuming he was given that name before he left the planet, is some solid bit of nominative determinism.

ladder.clue: <> {}, actor and member of the Obama administration
Change one letter in <> to get a painter
Word that sounds like <> that describes crabs and bears
Drop a letter from <> to get a place where <> was practiced, on TV
